amendment.description: To express support for the sovereignty, territorial integrity, and political independence of Lebanon.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3700 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3700 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S9588-9592; text: CR S9590) To express support for the sovereignty, territorial integrity, and political independence of Lebanon.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3700 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Ensign.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3700 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
